org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt
Interface Simulation

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSimulation, EfficientSimulation, NaiveSimulation, RefinedSimulation, SchematicSimulation
public interface Simulation

This interface defines the operations for computing simulation relations between states.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Method Summary
 void computeDirectSimulationRelation()
          Computes the largest direct simulation relation.
 void computeReverseSimulationRelation()
          Computes the largest reverse simulation relation.
 java.util.Set<StateSet> getDirectSimulationEquivalentSets()
          Returns the direct simulation equivalence sets.
 Relation<State> getDirectSimulationRelation()
          Returns the direct simulation relation.
 java.util.Set<StateSet> getReverseSimulationEquivalentSets()
          Returns the reverse simulation equivalence sets.
 Relation<State> getReverseSimulationRelation()
          Returns the reverse simulation relation.
 boolean isDirectSimulated(State s1, State s2)
          Returns true if s1 is directly simulated by s2.
 boolean isDirectSimulationEquivalent(State s1, State s2)
          Returns true if s1 is direct simulation equivalent to s2.
 boolean isReverseSimulated(State s1, State s2)
          Returns true if s1 is reversely simulated by s2.
 boolean isReverseSimulationEquivalent(State s1, State s2)
          Returns true if s1 is reverse simulation equivalent to s2.
 

Method Detail

getDirectSimulationRelation

Relation<State> getDirectSimulationRelation()
Returns the direct simulation relation. This method should be invoked after computeDirectSimulationRelation().

Returns:
the direct simulation relation

getReverseSimulationRelation

Relation<State> getReverseSimulationRelation()
Returns the reverse simulation relation. This method should be invoked after computeReverseSimulationRelation().

Returns:
the reverse simulation relation

isDirectSimulated

boolean isDirectSimulated(State s1,
                          State s2)
Returns true if s1 is directly simulated by s2. This method should be invoked after computeDirectSimulationRelation().

Parameters:
s1 - a state
s2 - a state
Returns:
true if s1 is directly simulated by s2

isReverseSimulated

boolean isReverseSimulated(State s1,
                           State s2)
Returns true if s1 is reversely simulated by s2. This method should be invoked after computeReverseSimulationRelation().

Parameters:
s1 - a state
s2 - a state
Returns:
true if s1 is reversely simulated by s2

isDirectSimulationEquivalent

boolean isDirectSimulationEquivalent(State s1,
                                     State s2)
Returns true if s1 is direct simulation equivalent to s2. State s1 and state s2 are direct simulation equivalent if and only if they can direct simulate each other. This method should be invoked after computeDirectSimulationRelation() .

Parameters:
s1 - a state
s2 - a state
Returns:
true if s1 is direct simulation equivalent to s2

isReverseSimulationEquivalent

boolean isReverseSimulationEquivalent(State s1,
                                      State s2)
Returns true if s1 is reverse simulation equivalent to s2. State s1 and state s2 are reverse simulation equivalent if and only if they can reverse simulate each other. This method should be invoked after computeReverseSimulationRelation().

Parameters:
s1 - a state
s2 - a state
Returns:
true if s1 is reverse simulation equivalent to s2

getDirectSimulationEquivalentSets

java.util.Set<StateSet> getDirectSimulationEquivalentSets()
Returns the direct simulation equivalence sets. For each set, every two states in the set are direct simulation equivalent. This method should be invoked after computeDirectSimulationRelation().

Returns:
the direct simulation equivalence sets

getReverseSimulationEquivalentSets

java.util.Set<StateSet> getReverseSimulationEquivalentSets()
Returns the reverse simulation equivalence sets. For each set, every two states in the set are reverse simulation equivalent. This method should be invoked after computeReverseSimulationRelation().

Returns:
the reverse simulation equivalence sets

computeDirectSimulationRelation

void computeDirectSimulationRelation()
Computes the largest direct simulation relation.

computeReverseSimulationRelation

void computeReverseSimulationRelation()
Computes the largest reverse simulation relation.
